p: Structure analyses were also performed separately using gSSR data only or EST-SSR data only. The most likely numbers of genetic clusters among the 16 populations were four ( S4 Fig) and three ( S5 Fig) for EST-SSRs and gSSRs, respectively. Overall, the same patterns were observed for both datasets, i.e., variation in cluster membership probabilities among populations and a west-east gradient of genetic variation across Europe.
